mp_station module¶

This module controls the Multi Purpose Station, it inherits from Machine

class mp_station.MPStation(revpi, name: str, line_name: str)[source]¶

Bases: Machine

Controls the Multi Purpose Station.

Methodes:

init(): Move to init position. run(): Runs the Multi Purpose Station routine. run_to_out(): Runs the Conveyor to move the product out.

__TIME_OVEN¶

Time that the oven should be active.

Type:

int

__TIME_SAW¶

Time that the saw should be active.

Type:

int

table¶

Actuator object for the table.

Type:

Actuator

init(as_thread=True)[source]¶

Move to init position.

Parameters:

as_thread (bool) – Runs the function as a thread.

run(with_oven=True, with_saw=False, as_thread=True)[source]¶

Runs the Multi Purpose Station routine.

Parameters:

  • with_oven (bool) – Product goes through oven.

  • with_saw (bool) – Product goes through saw.

  • as_thread (bool) – Runs the function as a thread.

run_to_out(as_thread=True)[source]¶

Runs the Conveyor to move the product out.

Parameters:

as_thread (bool) – Runs the function as a thread.
